Hello all,
I wanted to give you guys one more crack at what's left before I have to take them to ebay.  Credit card bill is coming due.
I am still holding on to Cobb (Red, SGC 20), Elberfeld (Washington, fielding, SGC 30), Kleinow (Boston catching SGC 30) and Evers (Chicago SGC 70 would be NM-MT but very nearly miscut), but would be willing to listen to offers.
Thanks,
Bob
